dict.acceptation: 湖；深红色颜料；胭脂红；[化]色淀；
血球溶解；使（血液）发生血球溶解；

sent.orig: Superior, Lake Michigan Lake Huron, Lake Erie and Lake Ontario are the Five Great Lakes.
sent.trans: 何谓五大湖素壁利亚湖，密西根湖，休伦湖，伊利湖，安大略湖。

sent.orig: Lake, Nansha North Lake, Lake Run Sands, sand hold Green Lake.
sent.trans: 沙湖，南沙北湖，湖润金沙，沙抱翠湖。

sent.orig: The famous natural landscape includes Heavenly Lake, Kanas Lake, Bosten Lake, Sayram Lake, Bayinbrook Grassland etc.
sent.trans: 著名的自然风景有天池、纳斯湖、斯腾湖、里木湖、音布鲁克草原等。

sent.orig: The city has faulted the plateau lakes Fuxian Lake, Xingyun Lake, Qilu Lake and Yangzonghai.
sent.trans: 市内有高原断陷湖泊抚仙湖、星云湖、杞麓湖和阳宗海。

sent.orig: Mansion from the West Lake, East Lake, and then to Lake Washington Wan villa.
sent.trans: 从西湖顶级寓所，到东湖绝版豪宅，再到华盛顿湖湾区别墅。
